title: How to run bat.fle replay
body:
Hello guys, i need help. I downloaded some replays from op.gg and lolking. But i dont know how to run them. I found some instructions but it doesnt work. These files end bat. Please help me i want to improve. 

THx much :)

replies.body: Replay files are played through the client, so if you're looking to watch someone else you may need to get a highlight from them instead.
